name: NeverBound
description: NeverBound is the gravity-shifting shooter that brings you mind-bending combat and puzzles in multi-gravity environments. You are as dangerous from below as you are from above. The rules have changed. High ground is relative.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 4 GB available space
